title: Why do we always complain about stats, instead of the champions abusing the stats?
body: Everyone says that lethality is strong, but the fact is every AD scaling champ has access to it. But we all know not all champions are the same, so some champions will synergize with it better than others. Instead of nerfing a stat, why don't we just target the champions who are actually a problem? Talon got one small buff, and all of a sudden he has like a 56%+ winrate everywhere in diamond+.
